lemma map_mset_unsorted_term_poly_list_rel: \<open>(\<And>a. a \<in> mononoms s \<Longrightarrow> distinct a) \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>x \<in> mononoms s. distinct x \<Longrightarrow> (\<forall>xs \<in> mononoms s. sorted_wrt (rel2p (Id \<union> var_order_rel)) xs) \<Longrightarrow> (s, map (\<lambda>(a, y). (mset a, y)) s) \<in> \<langle>term_poly_list_rel \<times>\<^sub>r int_rel\<rangle>list_rel\<close>
